prompts: Create a bar chart comparing quarterly revenue across North America, Europe, and Asia Pacific regions for the past two years
Show me a pie chart breaking down the total marketing budget allocation between digital advertising, content creation, events, and PR campaigns
Generate a line graph tracking monthly website traffic, conversion rates, and bounce rates over the last 12 months

Create a comparison chart with a blue gradient background displaying average customer satisfaction scores by product category (Electronics, Clothing, Home & Garden, Sports) across different age demographics
Show a doughnut chart of the company's energy consumption sources including solar, wind, natural gas, and grid electricity with percentages
Generate a trend chart with a light grid background comparing daily active users, monthly active users, and user retention rates for mobile and web platforms
Create a bar chart comparing sales performance across Q1, Q2, Q3, and Q4 for three product lines: Premium, Standard, and Economy tiers
Display a pie chart with background image showing the distribution of customer support tickets by category: Technical Issues, Billing Questions, Feature Requests, and Account Problems
Generate a line graph tracking server response times, API latency, and database query performance metrics over the past 30 days
Create a bar chart with a subtle blue background comparing employee productivity metrics across different departments: Engineering, Sales, Marketing, and Customer Support
Show a pie chart of revenue breakdown by sales channel: Online Store, Retail Partners, Direct Sales, and Subscription Services
Generate a line chart with background showing monthly subscription growth, churn rate, and customer lifetime value trends for the past year
Create a bar chart displaying inventory levels for key product categories with reorder points and current stock levels
Show a pie chart with a green gradient background of customer demographics by age groups (18-25, 26-35, 36-45, 46-55, 55+) and their purchasing preferences
Generate a line graph comparing marketing campaign performance metrics: click-through rates, conversion rates, and cost per acquisition
Create a bar chart with background image showing feature usage statistics comparing mobile app features: Push Notifications, In-App Purchases, Social Sharing, and Analytics
Display a pie chart of project time allocation across different phases: Planning, Development, Testing, Deployment, and Maintenance
Generate a trend chart with a purple gradient background tracking customer retention rates, repeat purchase frequency, and average order value over the last 6 months
Create a comparison chart comparing subscription tier distribution: Free, Basic, Pro, and Enterprise plans with their respective user counts
Show a doughnut chart with light background of content type distribution across blog posts, videos, podcasts, infographics, and case studies with engagement metrics
Generate a line graph showing API request volumes, error rates, and successful transaction rates during peak and off-peak hours
Create a bar chart with background comparing regional sales performance with breakdowns for online vs. in-store purchases across different geographic markets
Display a pie chart of social media engagement showing likes, shares, comments, and click-throughs across Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and LinkedIn
Generate a line chart with a gray gradient background tracking monthly expenses categorized by Operations, Marketing, R&D, and Administrative costs over the fiscal year
Create a bar chart showing test scores by subject area: Mathematics, Science, Language Arts, and Social Studies with average scores and pass rates
Show a pie chart with background image of energy consumption sources with detailed breakdown: Renewable (Solar 35%, Wind 25%), Non-Renewable (Natural Gas 30%, Grid 10%)
Generate a trend graph comparing user growth metrics: new signups, active users, and premium conversions across different marketing campaigns
Create a comparison chart with a blue background displaying employee performance metrics with ratings for productivity, collaboration, innovation, and customer satisfaction
Show a doughnut chart of market share distribution comparing our company's position against Competitor A, Competitor B, Competitor C, and Others
Generate a line chart with background showing temperature trends, humidity levels, and precipitation data for a weather monitoring station over the past 3 months
